pros: Small, flexible, friendly, Very student-centered. Ideas can be implemented fast. More nimble and creative now.
cons: Not enough people know of the school and how great it is for students.

job_title: Adjunct Professor in Delray Beach, FL
pros: Money if you absolutely need it.
cons: They are a for profit schools that bleeds non traditional students of their financial aid money.  They pay their adjuncts dirt and pay the administration and ownership a pretty penny.  They hardly merit the word college anywhere near their name.  Students expressed regret of being there but felt trapped.
